duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify accounts receivable collections and payments from sales reps and retail customers.
Count and verify payments of invoices billed as COD for orders picked up by retail customers.
Collect and deposit SPU's payments and follow up on past due SPU's with the Sales Department.
Process cash from invoice payments for a daily deposit and electronic scanning of checks for balancing.
Provide backup and relief for switchboard duties.
Perform other accounting functions as needed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED with two years of related experience in bank cashier or funds counting and balancing. Working knowledge of Excel and SAP.
